name: Ninja Baby Elephant Jump - Fun
description:
Free Elephant Ride - Fun

All Levels Unlocked and No Ads!
Jumping Elephant is an exciting game that will make you keep coming back.

This addicting and challenging game play goes on forever to meet your entertainment needs. The family and kids will love it!

Take Crazy Elephant on an adventure run and help him cover a huge distance. Jump over obstacles and collect lives as you run, jump and dodge.

There are different obstacles that makes your run even more interesting. So WATCH OUT!

Crazy Elephant's life chances are limited so cover the maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global game center leader board.

FEATURES:
Beautiful retina graphics! Looks AMAZING on iPhone's.
Use intuitive touch gestures to guide Crazy Elephant
Amazing animations and sounds..
Enjoyy...!!
